The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 20 January is 3,057,670 (5,432.3 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 15 January, there were 279,916 new confirmed cases (497.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 January, there were 370,620 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 24% (90,704 fewer cases).
